main_screen:top_toolbar_search_icon.name: main_screen:top_toolbar_search_icon
main_screen:top_toolbar_search_icon.description: A search icon button located in the top toolbar of the main screen.

main_screen:top_toolbar_search.name: main_screen:top_toolbar_search
main_screen:top_toolbar_search.description: An input field for search located in the top toolbar of the main screen.
main_screen:top_toolbar_search.effect: set text to update the search input field and navigate to the player_view_screen, which displays a list of recordings with details such as title, duration, date, size, and an overflow menu icon. Below the list, there are player controls including play/pause, previous, and next buttons, as well as a seek bar and current/max progress indicators. The top toolbar contains a search icon, a search input field with the text 'test1', and buttons for settings and about. At the bottom, there is a horizontal scroll view with tabs for switching between recorder and player views. The 'Player' tab is currently selected.

main_screen:settings_button.name: main_screen:settings_button
main_screen:settings_button.description: A button for accessing settings located in the top toolbar of the main screen.
main_screen:settings_button.effect: tap to navigate to the settings_screen, which contains a top toolbar with a back button and a title labeled 'Settings'. Below the toolbar, there is a scrollable view with various sections including options for color customization, general settings, and audio settings.

main_screen:about_button.name: main_screen:about_button
main_screen:about_button.description: A button for accessing about information located in the top toolbar of the main screen.
main_screen:about_button.effect: tap to navigate to the about_screen, which contains a top toolbar with a back button and a title labeled 'About'. Below the toolbar, there is a scrollable view with sections for support, help, and social links. Each section contains buttons for different options such as frequently asked questions, email support, contributors, donation, and social media links.

main_screen:recording_duration.name: main_screen:recording_duration
main_screen:recording_duration.description: A text element displaying the recording duration in the recorder view.

main_screen:toggle_recording_button.name: main_screen:toggle_recording_button
main_screen:toggle_recording_button.description: A button for toggling the recording state in the recorder view.

main_screen:recorder_tab.name: main_screen:recorder_tab
main_screen:recorder_tab.description: A button for switching to the recorder view, currently selected.

main_screen:player_tab.name: main_screen:player_tab
main_screen:player_tab.description: A button for switching to the player view.

main_screen:top_toolbar.name: main_screen:top_toolbar
main_screen:top_toolbar.description: A toolbar located at the top of the main screen containing search icon, search input field, settings button, and about button.

main_screen:recorder_holder.name: main_screen:recorder_holder
main_screen:recorder_holder.description: A container for the recorder view, including the recorder visualizer, recording duration, and toggle recording button.

main_screen:main_tabs_holder.description: A horizontal scroll view containing tabs for switching between recorder and player views.
main_screen:main_tabs_holder.effect: tap to navigate to the player_view_screen, which displays a list of recordings with details such as title, duration, date, size, and an overflow menu icon. Below the list, there are player controls including play/pause, previous, and next buttons, as well as a seek bar and current/max progress indicators. The top toolbar contains a search icon, a search input field with the text 'test1', and buttons for settings and about. At the bottom, there is a horizontal scroll view with tabs for switching between recorder and player views. The 'Player' tab is currently selected.

settings_screen:back_button.name: settings_screen:back_button
settings_screen:back_button.description: Button to navigate back to the previous screen.
settings_screen:back_button.effect: tap to navigate back to the main_screen, which contains a top toolbar with a search icon, a search input field, and buttons for settings and about. Below the toolbar, there is a main holder with a view pager displaying a recorder visualizer, recording duration, and a toggle recording button. At the bottom, there is a horizontal scroll view with tabs for switching between recorder and player views. The 'Recorder' tab is currently selected.

settings_screen:save_recordings_button.name: settings_screen:save_recordings_button
settings_screen:save_recordings_button.description: Button to save recordings in a specified location.
settings_screen:save_recordings_button.effect: tap to navigate to the select_folder_dialog_screen, which displays a dialog for selecting a folder. It contains a title at the top, a breadcrumb navigation bar showing the current path, and a list of files and folders. Each item in the list includes an icon, a name, and details such as size. At the bottom, there are Cancel and OK buttons.

settings_screen:save_recordings_location.name: settings_screen:save_recordings_location_button
settings_screen:save_recordings_location.description: Button to select the location for saving recordings.

settings_screen:extension_button.name: settings_screen:extension_button
settings_screen:extension_button.description: Button to set the file extension for recordings.
settings_screen:extension_button.effect: tap to navigate to the select_extension_dialog_screen, which displays a dialog for selecting a file extension. It contains a scrollable view with a group of checkboxes for selecting different file extensions. The options include m4a (selected), mp3, and ogg (Opus).

settings_screen:extension_value_button.name: settings_screen:extension_value_button
settings_screen:extension_value_button.description: Button displaying the current file extension for recordings.

settings_screen:audio_source_button.name: settings_screen:audio_source_button

settings_screen:audio_source_value_butto.name: settings_screen:audio_source_value_button
settings_screen:audio_source_value_butto.description: Button displaying the current audio source for recordings.

settings_screen:bitrate_button.name: settings_screen:bitrate_button
settings_screen:bitrate_button.description: Button to set the bitrate for recordings.
settings_screen:bitrate_button.effect: tap to navigate to the bitrate_selection_dialog_screen, which contains a scrollable view with a group of checkboxes for selecting different bitrates. The options include 32 kbps, 64 kbps, 96 kbps, 128 kbps (selected), 160 kbps, 192 kbps, 256 kbps, and 320 kbps.

warning_dialog_screen:ok_button.name: warning_dialog_screen:ok_button
warning_dialog_screen:ok_button.description: A button to acknowledge the warning message and proceed.
warning_dialog_screen:ok_button.effect: tap to navigate to the theme_selection_screen, which contains a scrollable view with a group of checkboxes for selecting different themes. The options include auto light/dark, light, dark (selected), dark red, white, black & white, and custom.

theme_selection_screen:theme_options.name: theme_selection_screen:theme_options
theme_selection_screen:theme_options.description: A list of theme options presented as checkboxes within a RadioGroup. The options include Auto light / dark, Light, Dark, Dark red, White, Black & White, and Custom.
theme_selection_screen:theme_options.effect: tap to navigate to the customize_colors_screen, which contains a top toolbar with a back button and a title labeled 'Customize colors'. Below the toolbar, there is a scrollable view with various sections for customization, including options for changing the theme, text color, background color, primary color, accent color, and app icon color. Each section contains a label button and an associated color indicator. There is also a 'Save' button in the toolbar.

theme_selection_screen.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <framelayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <linearlayoutcompat resource_id="parentPanel">
      <framelayout resource_id="customPanel">
       <framelayout resource_id="custom">
        <scrollview resource_id="dialog_radio_holder">
         <radiogroup resource_id="dialog_radio_group">
          <checkbox>
          </checkbox>
         </radiogroup>
        </scrollview>
       </framelayout>
      </framelayout>
     </linearlayoutcompat>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>

Below the toolbar, there is a scrollable view with various sections including options for color customization, general settings, and audio settings.

change_date_time_dialog_screen:ok_button.name: change_date_time_dialog_screen:ok_button

change_date_time_dialog_screen.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <framelayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <linearlayoutcompat resource_id="parentPanel">
      <framelayout resource_id="customPanel">
       <framelayout resource_id="custom">
        <scrollview resource_id="change_date_time_dialog_scrollview">
         <linearlayout resource_id="change_date_time_dialog_holder">
          <radiogroup resource_id="change_date_time_dialog_radio_group">
           <checkbox resource_id="change_date_time_dialog_radio_one">
           </checkbox>
           <checkbox resource_id="change_date_time_dialog_radio_two">
           </checkbox>
           <checkbox resource_id="change_date_time_dialog_radio_three">
           </checkbox>
           <checkbox resource_id="change_date_time_dialog_radio_eight">
           </checkbox>
           <checkbox resource_id="change_date_time_dialog_radio_seven">
           </checkbox>
           <checkbox resource_id="change_date_time_dialog_radio_four">
           </checkbox>
           <checkbox resource_id="change_date_time_dialog_radio_five">
           </checkbox>
           <checkbox resource_id="change_date_time_dialog_radio_six">
           </checkbox>
          </radiogroup>
          <imageview resource_id="sorting_dialog_order_divider">
          </imageview>
          <checkbox resource_id="change_date_time_dialog_24_hour">
          </checkbox>
         </linearlayout>
        </scrollview>
       </framelayout>
      </framelayout>
      <scrollview resource_id="buttonPanel">
       <linearlayout>
        <button resource_id="button2">
        </button>
        <button resource_id="button1">
        </button>
       </linearlayout>
      </scrollview>
     </linearlayoutcompat>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>

select_folder_dialog_screen:file_name.description: The name of the file presented as a button within the file_list.

select_folder_dialog_screen:file_details.name: select_folder_dialog_screen:file_details
select_folder_dialog_screen:file_details.description: The details of the file presented as a button within the file_list.

select_folder_dialog_screen:cancel_butto.name: select_folder_dialog_screen:cancel_button
select_folder_dialog_screen:cancel_butto.description: The button to cancel the folder selection.
select_folder_dialog_screen:cancel_butto.effect: tap to navigate to the settings_screen, which contains a top toolbar with a back button and a title labeled 'Settings'. Below the toolbar, there is a scrollable view with various sections including options for color customization, general settings, and audio settings. Each section contains buttons and checkboxes for different customization and settings options.

select_folder_dialog_screen:ok_button.name: select_folder_dialog_screen:ok_button
select_folder_dialog_screen:ok_button.description: The button to confirm the folder selection.

select_folder_dialog_screen:breadcrumb_b.name: select_folder_dialog_screen:breadcrumb_button
select_folder_dialog_screen:breadcrumb_b.description: A button in the breadcrumb navigation bar showing the current path.

select_folder_dialog_screen:fab_button.name: select_folder_dialog_screen:fab_button
select_folder_dialog_screen:fab_button.description: A floating action button for additional actions.

select_storage_dialog_screen:dialog_titl.name: select_storage_dialog_screen:dialog_title
select_storage_dialog_screen:dialog_titl.description: Title of the dialog for selecting storage.

select_storage_dialog_screen:storage_opt.name: select_storage_dialog_screen:storage_options
select_storage_dialog_screen:storage_opt.description: A group of checkboxes for selecting different storage options. The options include Internal and SD Card.
select_storage_dialog_screen:storage_opt.effect: tap to navigate to the select_folder_dialog_screen, which displays a dialog for selecting a folder. It contains a title, a breadcrumb navigation bar showing the current path, a list of files and folders with icons, names, and details such as size, and Cancel and OK buttons at the bottom.

select_extension_dialog_screen:extension.name: select_extension_dialog_screen:extension_options
select_extension_dialog_screen:extension.description: A group of checkboxes for selecting different file extensions within a scrollable view. The options include m4a, mp3, and ogg (Opus).
select_extension_dialog_screen:extension.effect: tap to select the mp3 file extension option within the select_extension_dialog_screen.

about_screen:back_button.name: about_screen:back_button
about_screen:back_button.description: A button in the toolbar used to navigate back to the previous screen.
about_screen:back_button.effect: tap to navigate back to the main_screen, which contains a top toolbar with a search icon, a search input field, and buttons for settings and about. Below the toolbar, there is a main holder with a view pager displaying a recorder visualizer, recording duration, and a toggle recording button. At the bottom, there is a horizontal scroll view with tabs for switching between recorder and player views. The 'Recorder' tab is currently selected.

about_screen:title.name: about_screen:title
about_screen:title.description: The title of the screen labeled 'About'.

about_screen:scroll_view.name: about_screen:scroll_view
about_screen:scroll_view.description: A scrollable view containing sections for support, help, and social links.

about_screen:support_options.name: about_screen:support_options
about_screen:support_options.description: A list of support options including frequently asked questions and email support.
about_screen:support_options.effect: tap to navigate to the frequently_asked_questions_screen, which displays a list of common questions and answers.

about_screen:help_us_options.name: about_screen:help_us_options
about_screen:help_us_options.description: A list of options for helping the app including contributors and donation.

about_screen:social_options.name: about_screen:social_options
about_screen:social_options.description: A list of social media links including Facebook, GitHub, Reddit, and Telegram.

about_screen:support_item_holder.name: about_screen:support_item_holder
about_screen:support_item_holder.description: A list of support items including frequently asked questions and email support. Each item contains an icon and a label.

about_screen:help_us_item_holder.name: about_screen:help_us_item_holder
about_screen:help_us_item_holder.description: A list of help us items including contributors and donation. Each item contains an icon and a label.

about_screen:social_item_holder.name: about_screen:social_item_holder
about_screen:social_item_holder.description: A list of social media items including Facebook, GitHub, Reddit, and Telegram. Each item contains an icon and a label.

player_view_screen:top_toolbar_search_ic.name: player_view_screen:top_toolbar_search_icon
player_view_screen:top_toolbar_search_ic.description: A button to activate the search functionality in the top toolbar.

player_view_screen:top_toolbar_search.name: player_view_screen:top_toolbar_search
player_view_screen:top_toolbar_search.description: An input field for entering search queries in the top toolbar.

player_view_screen:settings_button.name: player_view_screen:settings_button
player_view_screen:settings_button.description: A button to navigate to the settings screen.

player_view_screen:about_button.name: player_view_screen:about_button
player_view_screen:about_button.description: A button to navigate to the about screen.

player_view_screen:recordings_list.name: player_view_screen:recordings_list
player_view_screen:recordings_list.description: A list of recordings displayed as a RecyclerView. Each recording item includes the title, duration, date, size, and an overflow menu icon.
player_view_screen:recordings_list.effect: tap to open the recording_details_page, which displays the detailed view of the selected recording, including playback controls, metadata, and options for sharing or deleting the recording.

player_view_screen:recording_title.description: The title of the recording presented as a button within the recording item.

player_view_screen:play_pause_button.description: A button to play or pause the current recording.

player_view_screen:previous_button.name: player_view_screen:previous_button
player_view_screen:previous_button.description: A button to play the previous recording.

player_view_screen:next_button.name: player_view_screen:next_button
player_view_screen:next_button.description: A button to play the next recording.

player_view_screen:player_progressbar.name: player_view_screen:player_progressbar
player_view_screen:player_progressbar.description: A seek bar to navigate through the current recording.

player_view_screen:recorder_tab.name: player_view_screen:recorder_tab
player_view_screen:recorder_tab.description: A button to switch to the recorder view.
player_view_screen:recorder_tab.effect: tap to navigate to the main_screen, which contains a top toolbar with a search icon, a search input field, and buttons for settings and about. Below the toolbar, there is a main holder with a view pager displaying a recorder visualizer, recording duration, and a toggle recording button. At the bottom, there is a horizontal scroll view with tabs for switching between recorder and player views. The 'Recorder' tab is currently selected.

player_view_screen:player_tab.name: player_view_screen:player_tab
player_view_screen:player_tab.description: A button to switch to the player view. Currently selected.

player_view_screen:player_title.name: player_view_screen:player_title
player_view_screen:player_title.description: The title of the currently playing recording displayed in the player controls.

player_view_screen:player_progress_curre.name: player_view_screen:player_progress_current
player_view_screen:player_progress_curre.description: The current progress time of the recording displayed as a button.

player_view_screen:player_progress_max.name: player_view_screen:player_progress_max
player_view_screen:player_progress_max.description: The maximum progress time of the recording displayed as a button.

player_view_screen:recordings_fastscroll.name: player_view_screen:recordings_fastscroller
player_view_screen:recordings_fastscroll.description: A container for the recordings list and player controls.

player_view_screen:player_controls_wrapp.name: player_view_screen:player_controls_wrapper
player_view_screen:player_controls_wrapp.description: A container for the player controls including play/pause, previous, next buttons, and progress indicators.

player_view_screen:player_divider.name: player_view_screen:player_divider
player_view_screen:player_divider.description: A divider separating the player controls from the recordings list.

player_view_screen:player_controls.name: player_view_screen:player_controls
player_view_screen:player_controls.description: A container for the player control buttons including previous, play/pause, and next.

player_view_screen:main_tabs_holder.name: player_view_screen:main_tabs_holder
player_view_screen:main_tabs_holder.description: A horizontal scroll view containing tabs for switching between recorder and player views.

player_view_screen:main_layout.name: player_view_screen:main_layout
player_view_screen:main_layout.description: The main layout container for the player view screen, holding various UI elements including the top toolbar, recordings list, player controls, and tabs.

player_view_screen:main_menu.name: player_view_screen:main_menu
player_view_screen:main_menu.description: The main menu layout containing the top toolbar and main holder.

player_view_screen:top_app_bar_layout.name: player_view_screen:top_app_bar_layout
player_view_screen:top_app_bar_layout.description: The top app bar layout containing the top toolbar holder.

player_view_screen:top_toolbar_holder.description: The top toolbar holder containing the search icon, search input field, and buttons for settings and about.

player_view_screen:main_holder.description: The main holder containing the view pager, recordings list, player controls, and tabs.

player_view_screen:view_pager.name: player_view_screen:view_pager
player_view_screen:view_pager.description: A scrollbar for navigating through the player view screen.

player_view_screen:recording_frame.name: player_view_screen:recording_frame
player_view_screen:recording_frame.description: A frame layout containing individual recording items.

player_view_screen:item_holder.name: player_view_screen:item_holder
player_view_screen:item_holder.description: A relative layout holding the details of each recording item including title, duration, date, size, and overflow menu icon.

player_view_screen:trackView.name: player_view_screen:trackView
player_view_screen:trackView.description: A linear layout for displaying the track view.

player_view_screen:recorder_tab_icon.name: player_view_screen:recorder_tab_icon
player_view_screen:recorder_tab_icon.description: An icon representing the recorder tab in the horizontal scroll view.

player_view_screen:player_tab_icon.name: player_view_screen:player_tab_icon
player_view_screen:player_tab_icon.description: An icon representing the player tab in the horizontal scroll view.

player_view_screen.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <framelayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <viewgroup resource_id="main_coordinator">
      <linearlayout resource_id="main_menu">
       <linearlayout resource_id="top_app_bar_layout">
        <relativelayout resource_id="top_toolbar_holder">
         <imageview resource_id="top_toolbar_search_icon">
         </imageview>
         <input resource_id="top_toolbar_search"/>
         <viewgroup resource_id="top_toolbar">
          <linearlayoutcompat>
           <button resource_id="settings">
           </button>
           <button resource_id="about">
           </button>
          </linearlayoutcompat>
         </viewgroup>
        </relativelayout>
       </linearlayout>
      </linearlayout>
      <relativelayout resource_id="main_holder">
       <scrollbar resource_id="view_pager">
        <viewgroup resource_id="player_holder">
         <relativelayout resource_id="recordings_fastscroller">
          <recyclerview resource_id="recordings_list">
           <framelayout resource_id="recording_frame">
            <relativelayout resource_id="item_holder">
             <imageview resource_id="overflow_menu_icon">
             </imageview>
            </relativelayout>
           </framelayout>
          </recyclerview>
          <linearlayout resource_id="trackView">
          </linearlayout>
         </relativelayout>
         <relativelayout resource_id="player_controls_wrapper">
          <view resource_id="player_divider">
          </view>
          <button resource_id="player_progress_current">
          </button>
          <seekbar resource_id="player_progressbar">
          </seekbar>
          <button resource_id="player_progress_max">
          </button>
          <relativelayout resource_id="player_controls">
           <button resource_id="previous_btn">
           </button>
           <button resource_id="play_pause_btn">
           </button>
           <button resource_id="next_btn">
           </button>
          </relativelayout>
         </relativelayout>
        </viewgroup>
       </scrollbar>
       <horizontalscrollview resource_id="main_tabs_holder">
        <linearlayout>
         <linearlayout>
          <linearlayout resource_id="tab_item_holder">
           <imageview resource_id="tab_item_icon">
           </imageview>
           <button resource_id="tab_item_label">
           </button>
          </linearlayout>
         </linearlayout>
        </linearlayout>
       </horizontalscrollview>
      </relativelayout>
     </viewgroup>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>
